fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Factional chat and kill (factional kill only works on full moons)
- All members appear innocent until the faction kills someone at night. 
- Each time a good player is hanged, the faction gains a new upgrade.
- The faction starts with 1 Head member, who is always unique, and the rest are Deception. If there are 4 or more members, 1 member will be a Support.

fields.name: Upgrades:
fields.value:
1: Can perform the factional kill each night.
2: The factional kill is a powerful rampage.
3: The factional kill can target two players each night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all opposition to the Elites.
